Package utils

Class MaxMinValues

  • java.lang.Object
    • utils.MaxMinValues
  • public class MaxMinValues
extends java.lang.Object
    A class to contain all of the methods used to analyse recent readings and to return the MAXIMUM and MINIMUM values for each of the readings from the Station.
    Author:
    Dermot O'Riordan

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      MaxMinValues()  

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      static int getMaxPressure​(Station stations)
      This method analyses all pressure readings for a station and returns the highest recorded pressure (in hPa) for that station.
      static double getMaxTempC​(Station stations)
      This method analyses all temperature readings for a station and returns the highest recorded temperature (in degrees Celcius) for that station.
      static double getMaxWindSpeed​(Station stations)
      This method analyses all wind speed readings for a station and returns the highest recorded wind speed (in Km/h) for that station.
      static int getMinPressure​(Station stations)
      This method analyses all pressure readings for a station and returns the lowest recorded pressure (in hPa) for that station.
      static double getMinTempC​(Station stations)
      This method analyses all temperature readings for a station and returns the lowest recorded temperature (in degrees Celcius) for that station.
      static double getMinWindSpeed​(Station stations)
      This method analyses all wind speed readings for a station and returns the lowest recorded wind speed (in Km/h) for that station.

      • getMaxTempC

        public static double getMaxTempC​(Station stations)
        This method analyses all temperature readings for a station and returns the highest recorded temperature (in degrees Celcius) for that station.
        Parameters:
        stations - The station whose readings are to be analysed.
        Returns:
        The highest temperature reading in degrees Celcius.

        public static double getMinTempC​(Station stations)
        This method analyses all temperature readings for a station and returns the lowest recorded temperature (in degrees Celcius) for that station.
        Parameters:
        stations - The station whose readings are to be analysed.
        Returns:
        The lowest temperature reading in degrees Celcius.
